record.description: Another teaching method is actual conversation in small groups, led by a native instructor. Here Juen Sigematsu, Japanese-American girl and language instructor at the University of Chicago, talks with a group of soldiers. Left to right: Peter Stevens, Ernest Bonyhadi, Adam Cappello and Sigfried Kent.
